Parameters: id of a style resource that defines the attributes. See @B_com#google#android#gms#R#styleable#WalletFragmentStyle_E@ for a list of attributes available
setFragmentStyle(int).Description: Sets a set of attributes to customize the look and feel of the UI components of a @B_com#google#android#gms#wallet#fragment#WalletFragment_E@. If not set explicitly the default style @B_com#google#android#gms#R#style#WalletFragmentDefaultStyle_E@ will be used. In most cases you will need to customize the style of the wallet fragment so that the UI of the fragment better matches the UI of the application.

setTheme(int).Description: Sets a theme for the Wallet selector on Android OS with @B_android#os#Build#VERSION#SDK_INT_E@ >= @B_android#os#Build#VERSION_CODES#HONEYCOMB_E@. The only legitimate values are @B_com#google#android#gms#wallet#WalletConstants#THEME_DARK_E@ and @B_com#google#android#gms#wallet#WalletConstants#THEME_LIGHT_E@ as those are the only supported themes. User-created themes are not supported. Value ignored for Android OS with @B_android#os#Build#VERSION#SDK_INT_E@ < @B_android#os#Build#VERSION_CODES#HONEYCOMB_E@. Defaults to @B_com#google#android#gms#wallet#WalletConstants#THEME_DARK_E@.

setFragmentStyle(com.google.android.gms..Description: Sets a set of attributes to customize the look and feel of the UI components of a @B_com#google#android#gms#wallet#fragment#WalletFragment_E@.

setEnvironment(int).Description: Sets the Google Wallet environment to use. Specify @B_com#google#android#gms#wallet#WalletConstants#ENVIRONMENT_SANDBOX_E@ until you have applied for and been granted access to the Production environment. Defaults to @B_com#google#android#gms#wallet#WalletConstants#ENVIRONMENT_SANDBOX_E@.

setMode(int).Description: Sets the mode of the wallet fragment. Supported modes are defined by @B_com#google#android#gms#wallet#fragment#WalletFragmentMode_E@. Defaults to @B_com#google#android#gms#wallet#fragment#WalletFragmentMode#BUY_BUTTON_E@.
